id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [TM1637 7-Segment Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/tm1637.html#configuration-variables)*

intensity.docs:
**int**: The intensity with which the TM1637 should drive the outputs. Range is from 0 (least intense) to 7 (the default).



*See also: [TM1637 7-Segment Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/tm1637.html#configuration-variables)*

inverted.docs:
**bool**: Invert character rendering to the TM1637 so you can physically flip the display around.



*See also: [TM1637 7-Segment Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/tm1637.html#configuration-variables)*

length.docs:
**int**: The amount of digits your TM1637 is driving. Only used when `inverted: true` Range is from 1 to 6 (the default).



*See also: [TM1637 7-Segment Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/tm1637.html#configuration-variables)*

clk_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin you have the CLK line hooked up to.



*See also: [TM1637 7-Segment Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/tm1637.html#configuration-variables)*

dio_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin you have the DIO line hooked up to.



*See also: [TM1637 7-Segment Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/tm1637.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to re-draw the screen. Defaults to `1s`.



*See also: [TM1637 7-Segment Display](https://esphome.io/components/display/tm1637.html#configuration-variables)*
